title: Comprehensive Weekly Content Template
purpose: Standardized structure for creating consistent, high-quality weekly pregnancy content

title.guidelines: Clear, engaging, week-specific. Should inspire wonder or provide comfort.

structure.creative: Unique, personal comparison beyond traditional fruits

required_sections.name: development_highlights
required_sections.description: 3-5 key developmental milestones for the week

required_sections.name: connection_activities
required_sections.description: Ways families can bond with baby at this stage

personalization_tags.description: Tags for content filtering and personalization

cultural_adaptations.description: Guidance for adapting content to different cultural contexts

delivery_timing.description: Optimal time of day for content delivery

emotional_tone.description: Primary emotional feeling content should evoke

medical_accuracy.required: All health information must be evidence-based
medical_accuracy.review_needed: Content with medical claims requires healthcare provider review
medical_accuracy.sources: Based on ACOG, WHO, and current obstetric guidelines

emotional_intelligence.tone: Warm, supportive friend who is knowledgeable but not clinical
emotional_intelligence.validation: Acknowledge that every pregnancy experience is unique

cultural_sensitivity.assumptions: Avoid economic, cultural, or religious assumptions
cultural_sensitivity.adaptability: Content should be adaptable to various cultural contexts

accessibility.length: Scannable with key points easily identifiable
accessibility.visual_descriptions: Include alt text concepts for visual elements

medical_review.reviewer_qualifications: Licensed healthcare provider with obstetric experience
medical_review.review_frequency: Annual or when medical guidelines change

user_testing.iteration_process: Update content based on user feedback patterns

content_versioning.version_control: Track all content changes and updates
content_versioning.approval_process: Medical and cultural review required for significant changes
